# VuePress + Github

# git报错10053

git推送时报错：Connection was aborted, errno 10053

Git默认限制推送的大小，运行命令更改限制大小即可

解决方法：
git config --global http.postBuffer 524288000

Last Updated: 7/6/2021, 6:14:44 PM
